Hello Vaijanath,

Vaijanath N. Rao wrote:
> 2008-09-16T10:24:35.905Z    -5       7149 
> http://www.gotamobi.com/amember/signup.php - - text/html #020 
> 20080916102434525+1376 sha1:45DW6AQM2PCN5J73GGWPAEFGKMMRRXFP - 
> err=java.nio.charset.IllegalCharsetNameException
>  java.nio.charset.IllegalCharsetNameException:
>   

This url has this http header line:
Content-Type: text/html; charset=
Not too surprisingly, the empty string is not a valid charset name.

> Another Example would be (this is from logs/alerts.log directory)
>
> SEVERE: Problem java.nio.charset.UnsupportedCharsetException: 
> ISO-8859-16 occured when trying to process 
> 'http://www.memorybits.co.uk/robots.txt' at step 
>   

ISO-8859-16 is a valid encoding, but java apparently  doesn't support 
it. :-\

Noah
